name: Meteorite Defense Command
description: Meteorite Defense Command is a fun, color-full and fast game, inspired by the classical coin-operated arcade games of the golden era.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP or newer Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 10 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires monitor to support 1080p resolution
